publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5339 Hugh Henry: Schools (Health Promotion and Nutrition) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Schools (Health Promotion and Nutrition) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Robert Brown*
